description: Try our easy to follow Spaghetti Bolognese Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spaghetti Bolognese Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir basil into bolognese sauce. Fill pie crust with sauce and smooth the top. Whisk remaining egg and ricotta together, then season with salt and pepper. Spread over the bolognese sauce. Sprinkle with mozzarella. Bake for 30 minutes or until top is golden. Serve garnished with extra basil leaves.
